name: BlockAid
description: Provide safe passage to a never ending stream of pawns by placing blocks themed around protection, education and livelihood in this minimalistic puzzler created for the HELP: THE GAME compilation!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: Cute game, possibly would've been more fitting as a mobile app, but still fun!
